body.p: This topic references content from the MS Excel documents that are referenced within the DITA map.

section.title: Inserting Cross References
section.p: Cross reference links to Excel documents or to content inside of them can be inserted by invoking the Link Cross Reference... action from the contextual menu.
Example: This is a cross reference to a table inside the Excel document: Products.

section.title: Inserting Content References
section.p: For referencing reused content from Excel documents, you can invoke the Reuse Reuse Content... action from the contextual menu.
